Delegation of UAWK Leaves for Mongolia and Vietnam
   Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) headed by Kil Sang Bong, vice-chairman of its Central Committee, left here today to visit Mongolia and Vietnam.
